Events

Biotechnology Design

The aim is to present biotechnological concepts and methods related to the year’s theme, this year’s theme being ‘food’.

Fashion Design

Participants research, design, create a portfolio, and a wearable prototype relating to the current year’s theme.

SciVis

Attendees create processes on 2D/3D graphic tools to illustrate a STEM concept.

On Demand Video

Participants are expected to write, shoot, and edit a 60-second video on-site during the conference.

Technology Bowl

Participants take a test regarding to TSA and concepts of technology content standards.

Software Development

Attendees are expected to develop, apply, test and document software that would be educationally or socially valuable.

Webmaster

The challenge of this event is to design and build a website based on the year’s theme, this year’s theme being ‘artificial intelligence’.

System Control Technology

The goal of System Control Technology is to build a robot, which is able to solve the given problem.

Essays on Technology

Participants write an essay in the span of 90 minutes, based on a promt provided on-site.
